pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CyberSpace## Wikipedia### InfoBox```pythonfrom cyberspace import Wikipediaw = Wikipedia(rate_limit_wait_seconds=0.1)result = w.search('steve wozniak')[0]print(result)```**output**```json{ "title_1": "Steve Wozniak", "unknown_row_1": { "texts": [ "Wozniak in 2018" ], "links": [ { "url": "/wiki/File:Steve_Wozniak,_November_2018.jpg" } ] }, "Born": { "texts": [ "Stephen Gary Wozniak[1](p18) (1950-08-11) August 11, 1950 (age 68)San Jose, California, U.S." ], "links": [ { "url": "#cite_note-iWoz-1", "text": "[1]" }, { "title": "San Jose, California", "url": "/wiki/San_Jose,_California", "text": "San Jose" }, { "title": "California", "url": "/wiki/California", "text": "California" } ] }, ...```
